articles.author: sport
articles.title: Is Dhoni done? Indian great contemplates future after CSK pull off miracle to win IPL
articles.description: Indian cricket superstar M.S. Dhoni said he will look to return for the next IPL season after he led Chennai Super Kings to a record-equalling fifth title over Gujarat Titans in what many believed to be his last match.
articles.content:
• Monday's IPL final went down to the wire, with Ravindra Jadeja hitting 10 runs in the final two balls to win it for CSK.
  • The match had been reduced because of rain. 
  • CSK star … [+3497 chars]

articles.author: Manish Singh
articles.title: Free cricket streaming helps Ambani's JioCinema break world record
articles.description: India's JioCinema broke the global record for the most concurrent views to a live streamed event on Monday.
articles.content: India’s JioCinema broke the global record for the most concurrent views to a live streamed event on Monday, beating a milestone set by Disney’s Hotstar years ago, as tycoon Mukesh Ambani spares no ex… [+661 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
